name: The Crows Crows Crows Community Museum
name_original: The Crows Crows Crows Community Museum
description:
Vincent van Gogh, Picasso, the Crows Crows Crows Community Discord. All of these people have something in common, and that is the fundamental human right to have a museum dedicated to them.

Introducing the The Official Crows Crows Crows Community Discord Museum (working title) (TOCCCCDM(wt))! Over the course of two weeks in September 2018, we collaborated with everyone in our community to build a digital museum and fill it with a vast array of strange exhibits.

Explore and contemplate! Peer into The Space Exhibit! Press C to cough!

If you like this sort of thing and would want to participate in any future jams we do (or just hang out in a cool place with a weird smell), just buckle down and join the fun right here: https://discord.gg/crows

See you in the museum!

- The Janitor
